price: Ɛberε a wͻn nua Noa ka kyerεε wͻn sε: “Enti monnsuro Nyankopͻn na monnyε ahwεyie?
arabic: إِذۡ قَالَ لَهُمۡ أَخُوهُمۡ نُوحٌ أَلَا تَتَّقُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: idh qāla lahum akhūhum nūḥun alā tattaqūna
